Title: The Cursed Ones
Writer: Maximilian Claussen, Nicholas K. Lory (story), Maximilian Claussen (story), Nana Obiri-Yeboah (story)
Actors: Oris Erhuero, Jimmy Jean-Louis, Ama K. Abebrese, Fred Nii Amugi
Plot: A disillusioned reporter and a young, reformed Pastor attempt to save the life of a child accused of witchcraft by bravely fighting back against corruption and false prophets.
